title: RP Cards and Region Locking
body:
Okay so, my boyfriend lives in the UK but plays on the NA server (like me). He really wanted to buy Star Guardian Jinx for me but didnt want to use the US currency option because he wanted just enough for the skin (1820 RP) and the US RP options either give too less or WAY too much (1380 or 2800).
He knew that the 9 Pound RP Prepaid Card here in the UK would give 1850 (EXACTLY what we need without spending more money than needed), so he went out and bought it for me as a surprise.
However, because we have NA accounts, we can't credit the prepaid card onto our accounts because they're region locked (we weren't aware). So now we're stuck 9 pounds poorer (and not financially stable enough to just buy another one, this was a special once-in-a-while surprise) and we can't even get the RP onto our accounts. =(
If there's anyway we can fix this or do a trade or something it would be greatly appreciated.
Please help us out!

replies.body: RP Cards are specific to their own region and can't be used on another.  I now this was a special case, and I'd like to see if we can help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our Billing team can look into your case individually.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
Thank you so much! I'll do that right away!
